full_text: Finally getting to play around with #Nflverse data in R. For whatever it's worth, here is how well (epa/play)  QBs performed this year when they suffered a hit, and when they did not. Little thanks to @tejfbanalytics for guidance on the graphic creation! https://t.co/aZwLbgri4T

All three AFC playoff games this weekend are expected to be played in cold weather.

Of the six QBs expected to start in those games, Derek Carr has fared the worst in the cold with a career EPA/play of -0.09 in games played with a temperature 50Â° or cooler.

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/HUt0Uba675

The NFL season is over and so i tried to cluster NFL offense and their styles, from insipiration/tutorial of @PFF_Moo, @tejfbanalytics, @_Alexstern.
It is probably impossible to group 32 different offensive systems into just some groups, but i try it! #nflverse https://t.co/0YHMBuDa3R
